item.title: Dell U2720Q & MacBook Pro
item.description: Time to buy a new display. Spent some time researching the market and decided to go with the Dell UltraSharp 27 4K USB-C Monitor (U2720Q). Be aware that Dell also offers UP2720Q (notice the P letter) which is way more expensive and has features you probably don’t need (like colorimeter, …).
